protocol.text: All plants were grown at 22ËšC under long day photoperiod (16 hours in light and 8 hours in darkness)

The anthers at stages 4-7 were dissected and collected from the young floral buds of the plants of 3-4 weeks. Three biological replicates from each genetic background (Col., dyt1, and ams) were used for microarray analyses.
RMA to normalize and converted to logarithm base 2
RNA were extracted by using Plant RNase Mini kit (Qiagen).
